SENT.plain: We have investigated the effect of HGF in vivo and in vitro in MDS using a recently developed FCM assay involving the simultaneous measurement of cell surface antigens, DNA content, and BrdUrd or IodUrd incorporation

This allows for the determination of the dynamic cell kinetic parameters: LI, T(s), and T(pot) and we observed that in vitro HGF stimulation resulted in a significant decrease in mean T(pot) values from 6.6 to 3.5 days
Importantly, we demonstrated that in vivo GM-CSF administration to patients with RAEB resulted in a shortening of T(pot) within the 2 first weeks of GM-CSF treatment
